game.name: The Unplace
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: “The Unplace: Escaping The Cursed Place by Facing Different Trials” is a first-person game where you must escape a cursed place by completing a series of trials.
game.shortDescriptionEn: “The Unplace: Escaping The Cursed Place by Facing Different Trials” is a first-person game where you must escape a cursed place by completing a series of trials.

reviewHighlights.text: Als jemand, der in Deutschland wohnt, fand ich das Rätsel mit dem Flaschensammeln echt cool. 10 von 10 Punkten, hab Pfand für ein Bierchen abgegeben.
"The Unplace" is held minimalistic, and my first complete run took roughly 20 minutes. On paper, that sounds short—but replayability is what truly kee...
